Software Reviews : The Confidence Factor: The Decision-Maker's Tool Kit Publisher: Simple Software, Inc., 2 Pinewood Rd., Irvine CA 92714 (telephone: 714-857-9179) Year of Publication: 1983 Materials: One 5-¼ inch diskette and a 97-page manual. Price: $389 for a single license; additional educational licenses are available for $50 each. Machine Specificity: The program is available for computers running PC-DOS 1.1 or 2.0, some MS-DOS systems, and a few CP/M systems. It runs well on IBM-PC and compatibles, and Zenith Z-100 micros. System Requirements: 128K RAM, and one disk drive (two drives preferred) Effectiveness: Very good. Documentation: Adequate for those who are already familiar with the analytic techniques, but cannot be used as a means of learning them. Examples are all from private sector applications, so some creativity is required to apply the techniques to public-sector problems.
